title: 1  An Introduction to Remote Sensing
text:
1.1 Summary
This weeks lecture looked at an overview of remote sensing for earth observation and its several of its applications.

title: 1  An Introduction to Remote Sensing
text:
1.2 Applications
The ability of satellites to revisit the same point on earth every 16 days, allows for an extensive list of applications.






(Szpakowski and Jensen 2019)

title: 1  An Introduction to Remote Sensing
text:
1.3 Reflection




Szpakowski, David M., and Jennifer L. R. Jensen. 2019. “A Review of the Applications of Remote Sensing in Fire Ecology.” Remote Sensing 11 (22): 2638. https://doi.org/10.3390/rs11222638.
